block_comment: This block of code assigns a boolean value to `D_ctrl_b_is_dst` based on the condition of the logical OR operation among different operation codes (opcodes). The value of `D_ctrl_b_is_dst` will be true if any of the involved operation codes are true. This means the `D_ctrl_b_is_dst` reflects whether the current operation involves a certain group of instructions - those that are listed.
